roleset.name: tightly tangling, pinching, or impeding progress of
roleset.note: KINKING-N NOTES: Comparison to verb-pinch.01. (from kinking.01-n)

example.name: without causer
example.text: The importance of recognizing kinking of the aorta lies in the fact that it can mimic other more serious conditions, such as mediastinal tumor or aortic aneurysm.
